author: Ben Cohen
title: The NCAA Tournament’s Most Valuable Plays: Purdue and Cincinnati
text:
You don’t have to know anything about college basketball to win your NCAA tournament pool. It’s probably a good thing if you don’t. You’re better off if you’re blissfully unaware why Grayson Allen’s butt is now infamous—not least of all because that happens to be the smartest way to fill out your bracket.
The curious thing about beating your family, friends and That One Guy in Your Office Who’s Super Into Crypto is that it’s more about game theory than actual games.
...
